transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, good morning, ma'am. Main Aseem Khanna bol raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan, theek hai.
Executive: Ma'am, woh kal meri aapse baat hui thi na, phir shayad aap busy ho gaye toh aapka call nahi aa paya tha mere paas.
Customer: Actually, main soch rahi thi ki woh one time agar do-teen days dekhenge woh phir karenge.
Executive: Ma'am, aap ek baar dekh lo jaise bhi, baaki mera toh yahi aapko suggestion hai, aap services ke upar active raho. Jitni bhi buylead post ho rahi hai, woh aapko yaha par agar aap hyperactive rahoge toh woh aapko provide bhi ki jaayengi.
Baaki ma'am agar aap yeh bole ki agar se
Customer: Seriously, I will like to tell you ki mera jo laptop hai uske upar yeh pure time main upar chalte rakhti hu, main screen change nahi karti. Mujhe lagta hai ki ek din iski memory ho jaayegi and turant ke turant refresh karti rehti hu.
Executive: Ma'am, aap apne na system mein aap ek extension bhi ma'am download kar sakte ho. Google Chrome par aap simple likhiyega auto refresher ke naam se. Auto refresher ek extension hota hai. Usko aap apne Google Chrome mein add kar sakte ho. Usse kya hota hai woh har kuch time ke baad, 5 minute ke baad, 15 minute ya aadhe ghante ke baad auto refresh karta rehta hai. Toh woh bhi aapke liye help karega ki agar koi buylead post hui hai toh woh auto refresh hokar woh turant recent activity mein aapko dikhega. Hum log saare clients ko yeh suggest karte hai.
Customer: 5 minute, aap 5 minute ki baat kar rahe hai na. Within two to three minutes main usko refresh kar rahi hu.
Executive: Nahi ma'am, yaani usme
Executive: Ma'am, achhi baat hai aap refresh kar rahe hai ma'am, but wahi hota hai ki woh high sold category hone ki wajah se woh within a second consume ho jaati hai. Isliye thoda aapko woh lag raha hai. Baaki toh maine isliye aapko yeh diya ki jo bhi high sold category hai ya koi particular specific category hai, usme hum log yeh recommend karte hai ki client ko ki auto refresher ka jo extension hota hai woh help karta hai system ko auto refresh karne mein. Toh aapko agar lagta hai toh kar sakte hai, baaki maine yeh nahi bola aapko karna chahiye, zabardasti aapko karna hi padega. Maine sirf apna ek point of view aapke samne rakha.
Customer: Theek hai. I agreed, ma'am. Main samajh gayi. Aapko waise hi bata rahi hu ki like matlab main itna zyada usko use karti ki woh pure time active rehta hai aur usko turant ke turant refresh karti rehti hu. Kabhi kabhi toh 30 seconds mein hi refresh kar rahi hu.
Executive: Achhi baat hai ma'am, woh toh ma'am aap jaise active hai, baaki toh ma'am aisa nahi hai. Jitni bhi buylead ma'am post ho rahi hai, sabko waha aa bhi rahi hai. Bas wahi hai ki jitna yaani ki aap expectation kar rahe hai, usse thoda nahi reh sakta. Baaki toh ma'am aap yaha par dekhoge toh is mahine bhi aapne kaafi buylead consume kari hai, 40 se 50 buylead consume kiye hai ma'am.
Customer: Consume kari hai. Buylead consume kari hai definitely. But problem yeh hai na ki woh mere kaam ki nahi hai.
Executive: Main aapki baat ko samajh sakta hu, aap jo bol rahe hai dusre brand ki hai ya kuch bhi hai. Ma'am, kisi bhi particular brand ko aise brand jisse nahi likha. Aap dekhenge mostly maine wahi wali buylead use kari hai.
Hmm.
Executive: Dekho main har mahine agar main aapko batau na jaise ki yeh wala jo Allen Bradley PLC hai ya Allen Bradley VFD hai. Allen Bradley VFD ki thodi buyleads agar main aapko batau har mahine 60-70 yaani ki generate ho rahi hai. Toh ho sakta hai ki uske competitor zyada hone ki wajah se waha rehta hai. Allen Bradley ko aap ma'am manually bhi search kar sakte ho. Agar aapko lag raha hai ki bhai chalo mere ko dekhna hai koi manually buylead available hai ya nahi hai, toh waha par search bar mein jaakar aap usko manually search karke bhi check kar sakte hai ki buyleads aa rahi hai ya nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Leads toh aati hai na. Yeh nahi hai ki leads nahi aa rahi hai. Leads aati hai mujhe.
Executive: Woh sold out ja rahi hai. Sold out ho ja rahi hai turant. Wahi main bol raha. Kyunki ma'am 700-800 buylead toh generate ho rahi hai IndiaMART par, bas wahi hai ki thoda sa yaani ki high sold category hone ki wajah se woh within a second, do second, 5 second mein hi yaani consume ho ja rahi hai. Is wajah se thoda sa yaani ki
Customer: Aap thoda upar bhi boliye na ki uske thode increase kare.
Executive: Ma'am, main dekho ma'am, main aapki baat ko main, main aapko frankly main aapko batau, aapko yeh lagega shayad mujhe ki hume khushi ho rahi hai aapko agar koi pareshani ho rahi hai. Hum logo ne sab kuch yeh hai bhi discussion hai bhi, lekin ma'am kisi bhi ek particular category ya kisi particular catalog ki wajah se management koi apni itni badi policies mein change nahi kar sakta kyuki woh saare client ke liye rehta hai. Haan, feedback ma'am aapka taken hai. Feedback hum logo ka jab bhi hamari meetings hoti hai ya apne jo board mein hum logo ka jab bhi hamare reviews wagera hote hai, hum usme yeh point rakhte hai. Lekin main aapko yeh bolu haan ma'am main commitment de raha hu ki yeh applicable ho jaayega 15 din mein, ek mahine mein, toh shayad woh galat information hogi. Hum jitne bhi feedback aap jaise client hume dete hai, woh saare feedback apni company ke samne rakhte hai. Jitne bhi hamare senior logo ki jab bhi meeting hoti hai, board meeting hoti hai ya monthly reviews hote hai ya quarterly review hote hai ya yearly reviews hote hai, usme hum rakhte hai waha par. Unko jo jo feedback lagta hai ki bhai majority hai aur client iski demand kar raha hai, usko hum log applicable karte hai. Bahut saare feedback hamare jaise main ek chota sa example de raha hu, yeh jo service aap chala rahe ho, pehle yeh catalog hamara mobile mein open nahi hota tha. Lekin saare clients ne hume yeh feedback diya ki har koi aajkal mobile mein yaani ki active rehta hai, toh humne phir usko mobile compatible website banayi ma'am. Pehle lead manager itna strong nahi tha jitna strong ab hum logo ne lead manager banaya hai. Ya phir ma'am ki apne PNS form ke according jo hum log provide karwate hai jo calls ke through aata hai. Toh yeh saare jo changes hue hai woh sab feedback ke according hi time to time hue hai. Lekin wahi yeh, main aapko abhi bol du nahi ma'am main aapko karwa dunga 15-20 din mein ya ek mahine mein, toh woh galat information hogi ma'am.
Hmm.
Customer: Aap services hi chala rahe hai services ko. humne right kiya tha na. Jisme matlab jisme sale kiya tha na, six year hai yeh. Toh unhone mujhe yeh nahi bataya tha.
Executive: Ma'am, dekho unhone aapko jo bataya hoga woh available buyleads dikhai hongi ki itni buyleads hamare yaha generate ho rahi hai. Woh buyleads aapko yaani ki milti rahegi. Unhone yeh nahi bataya tha ki buylead expire ho jaati hai. Actually unhone puri information di hi nahi thi.
Hmm.
Executive: Nahi, main samajh sakta hu yeh unki galat baat hai ki buylead sold out kyuki ek buylead ka criteria jo hai woh paanch se paanch log consume kar sakte hai. Haan, agar koi buylead yaani ki woh rehta hai toh
Customer: Nahi, unhone balki mujhse kaha tha ki yeh pata nahi kya pata nahi kitna aur bola tha unhone. Unhone yeh nahi kaha tha ki paanch mein expire ho jaayega.
Executive: Main samajh gaya jo aap baat bol rahe hai woh kuch na kuch gap raha waha communication ka. Unko is tarah se waha par proper communication dena. Hum log isliye ma'am pehle hi woh karte hai aur abhi bhi main aapko wahi jo bata raha hu. But yeh main aapko yeh bas yeh thoda sa yaani ki batane ki koshish kar raha hu ki aisa nahi hai ki aapki industry mein business
Customer: Main sir se discuss karti hu. Main sir se discuss karti hu. Phir main aapko batati hu. Sir se most probably unhone kaha hai ki do-teen din aur try karna hai hume. Theek hai?
Executive: Ma'am, do-teen din mein kuch woh nahi ho pata hai. Aap ek baar mere ko jaise bhi aapka rehta hai aap mere ko bata dijiyega. Aur phir main aage jaise bhi rehta hai maine aapko bata bhi diya jis hisab se. Baaki for the timing main aapki jo complaint hai isko close kar deta hu. Baaki aapko rehta hai aap mujhe call back kar lijiyega ma'am.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, main aapki complaint close kar raha hu. Woh jaise bhi aapka decision hota hai toh main aapko ek baar haan, main aapko Monday call bhi kar lunga. Aapke paas ek feedback ma'am pehle aayega toh please waha positive middle feedback send kijiye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan, aage woh mere ko show karta rahega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Feels that the executive did not provide complete information.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested using auto-refresher extension.

- Explained how feedback is used for improvements.

- Executive will close the complaint for now.

- Executive will call back on Monday.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss with her sir.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, auto refresher, feedback
